name: Infinite Maze (AMG Games)
description:
Infinite Maze is a popular maze game with endless levels of any size you choose. Both children and adults can play it. Unique concept and design! Train your mind by playing Infinite Maze.

 Features of our game:

- This is a slider game, just point the way for the ball on the forks

- built-in level generator

- simple and nice interface, the game takes only 2MB

- unique concept: the size of the labyrinth depends on the size of your screen

- you can set your favorite size and play it as many times as you like

- unusual design of labyrinths in the form of a mosaic with thick walls

- unique ball path (shows current path, return and dead ends)

- several modes: classic, hidden, new "fill", size generator

- in the game 2 types of labyrinth generation

- achievement system
